Distributed Authoring History

Distributed Authoring History

  • Source: Received view from W3C (Dan Connolly)
  • 1989/90: Nexus web authoring tool
    • most of the world sees line-mode browser: not impressed
  • 1992: Mosaic 2.4 reaches critical mass.
    • "Publish/Browse" becomes the dominant model.
